entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 8:35 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:35 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 8:35 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023
